mapper.sql: a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids, a.area_id AS "area.id", a.code, a.act_type AS "actType", a.name, a.sort, a.type, a.grade, a.address, a.zip_code, a.phone, a.fax, a.email, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, a.useable AS useable, a.primary_person AS "primaryPerson", a.deputy_person AS "deputyPerson.id", p.name AS "parent.name", ar.name AS "area.name", ar.province AS "area.province", ar.city AS "area.city", pp.name AS "primaryPerson.name", dp.name AS "deputyPerson.name", a.alias AS "alias", a.tax_num AS "taxNum", a.gsphone AS "gsphone"
LEFT JOIN sys_office p ON p.id = a.parent_id LEFT JOIN sys_area ar ON ar.id = a.area_id LEFT JOIN sys_user pp ON pp.id = a.primary_person LEFT JOIN sys_user dp ON dp.id = a.deputy_person
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_office a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.code

SELECT
FROM sys_office a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_office( parent_id, parent_ids, area_id, act_type, code, name, sort, type, grade, address, zip_code, phone, fax, email, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, useable, primary_person, deputy_person, alias, tax_num, gsphone ) VALUES ( #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{area.id}, #{actType}, #{code}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{grade}, #{address}, #{zipCode}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{email}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{useable}, #{primaryPerson}, #{deputyPerson.id}, #{alias}, #{taxNum}, #{gsphone} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_office SET act_type = #{actType}, parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, area_id = #{area.id}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, grade = #{grade}, address = #{address}, zip_code = #{zipCode}, phone = #{phone}, fax = #{fax}, email = #{email}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, useable=#{useable}, primary_person=#{primaryPerson}, deputy_person=#{deputyPerson.id}, alias=#{alias}, tax_num=#{taxNum}, gsphone=#{gsphone} WHERE id = #{id}
